issue.message: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to write to shared storage, use the `MediaStore.createWriteRequest` intent.

READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is deprecated (and is not granted) when targeting Android 13+. If you need to query or interact with MediaStore or media files on the shared storage, you should instead use one or more new storage permissions: `READ_MEDIA_IMAGES`, `READ_MEDIA_VIDEO` or `READ_MEDIA_AUDIO`.
This RelativeLayout should use `android:layout_height="wrap_content"`
When targeting Android 13 or higher, posting a permission requires holding the `POST_NOTIFICATIONS` permission (usage from com.bumptech.glide.request.target.NotificationTarget)
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the `android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES` javadoc for details.

This folder configuration (`v24`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 24. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `MyScaleGestures` which has field `view` pointing to `View`); this is a memory leak
Possible overdraw: Root element paints background `@drawable/splash_img` with a theme that also paints a background (inferred theme is `@style/AppTheme.NoActionBar`)
